properties.entry:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT CPN_CODE ,CPN_NAME ,CPN_DC ,CPN_RGDT ,CPN_STR_DATE ,CPN_END_DATE FROM COUPON C ORDER BY CPN_RGDT DESC ) A
) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT CPN_RGDT , CPN_NAME , CPN_DC , CPN_STR_DATE , CPN_END_DATE
FROM MEMBER M JOIN CPN_PM P ON M.MEM_NO = P.KEY_NO INNER JOIN
WHERE MEM_NO = ?
